posts.post_content:
$875
Beautiful card - small mark and pinhole put the grade down. otherwise, presents very well

M.O., check or paypal gift preferred. Includes S&H. If want insurance, will need to include this in the price.

PM or email (nbbgmad.yahoo.com) if interested.
